## RecaptchaVerifier.render() method

Renders the reCAPTCHA widget on the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
render(): Promise<number>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;number&gt;

A Promise that resolves with the reCAPTCHA widget ID.
